agents.flight.PotentialDelayRecoveryProvider¶

class agents.flight.PotentialDelayRecoveryProvider(agent)¶

Bases: Role

PDRP: Potential Delay Recovery Provider

Description: Provides information on the potential delay that can be recovered by speeding up (increasing CI) with the current flight plan.

__init__(agent)¶

On initialisation of a Role, it gets a pointer to the Agent it belongs to.

Methods

__init__(agent)

On initialisation of a Role, it gets a pointer to the Agent it belongs to.

compute_potential_delay_recovery([...])

Compute the potential delay that can be recovered by the flight.

estimate_time_fuel_at_speed_change(points, ...)

Each point has a speed (speed_kt), a minimum (min_kt) and maximum (max_kt), in knots/hour.

estimate_time_fuel_speed_changes(from_position)

Estimate fuel speed changes getting time and fuel for the flight plan from a given position

four_degree(x, a, b, c, d, e)

provide_potential_delay_recover_information(...)

Reply with the potential delay recovery information

send(msg)

Function to send messages to its own agent

wait_for_potential_delay_recover_request(msg)

Entry point into the role: Getting a request for a potential delay recovery information In the request one can ask to use (or not) DCI for landing, if not provided, by default DCI will be considered (descent adjusted)
compute_potential_delay_recovery(force_compute=False, use_dci_landing=True)¶

Compute the potential delay that can be recovered by the flight. Force_compute to force the recomputation. Otherwise, if already computed in the past information is already used.

estimate_time_fuel_at_speed_change(points, speed_change_perc)¶

Each point has a speed (speed_kt), a minimum (min_kt) and maximum (max_kt), in knots/hour. mrc_kt is maximum range (minimum fuel per unit of distance).

estimate_time_fuel_speed_changes(from_position, use_dci_landing=True)¶

Estimate fuel speed changes getting time and fuel for the flight plan from a given position

provide_potential_delay_recover_information(potential_delay_recovery, to_uid)¶

Reply with the potential delay recovery information

send(msg)¶

Function to send messages to its own agent

wait_for_potential_delay_recover_request(msg)¶

Entry point into the role: Getting a request for a potential delay recovery information In the request one can ask to use (or not) DCI for landing, if not provided, by default DCI will be considered (descent adjusted)

Mercury
